评论概述: Super Cute, But on the Short Side
评论详情: I liked these and did end up keeping them, but they are my shortest pair of shorts. I’m 5’9 and weigh 148 pounds. I got size 29. They were a little bit too big, but the stretch in the shorts helps with that.
These shorts fit perfectly!  I am 5’7 137 lbs and ordered size 26.  They have a little more stretch than expected, but I compensated by sizing down. I love the short length!
Good fit that are true to size.

I hardly ever leave reviews, but these shorts are by far my favorite ones I have ordered. I purchased size 26, and weight between 115-120 lbs and am 5’1” tall. Purchased the color A trip, the lighter ones with not as much distressing. They are the perfect length, most are too short or too long, but these are perfect for for me being a mom that still wants to look stylish and hates super long shorts as my legs are short. They feel expensive, thick material, and a great steal at only like $20. Love the color and fit great.

评论概述: I sized up and they're still too small
评论详情: I have maybe 10 pairs of BLANKNYC jeans and wear a 29 in all of them and they fit like a glove. I ordered a size 30 in these shorts because I like them to fit a little more loose. I could barely button them! Definitely returned. If you order these, go up at least 2 sizes.
I’m short so the length was fantastic! However, too much fabric and they “flared” out instead of fitting my hips.. sadly, returned.
Flattering
These shorts wereb practically transparent.  I expect MUCH more from a "premium" brand

Excellent fit, true to size.  Soft and the most flattering denim shorts I own :-)

Favorite shorts, runs a smidge small

I love this brand! I've bought several pairs of their shorts, jeans and leather pants. I'm 5' and wear a 24/25. All of their clothes have a good amount of stretch so buy a size down. The stretch doesn't give way through the day nor if put in the dryer. Sometimes quality doesn't have a price...This just happens to be one of those brands...enjoy!
These jeans are not only look cute - they are super comfortable.  The denim is stretchy and soft.  I'm 5'6' and 135 pounds and the size 29 fits perfectly.

Though I returned the product, I will say these shorts were extremely cute and fit true to size! I ordered a size 27 and they fit perfectly in the waist... however, I do have skinny legs and know I am not built like the average woman. The legs of the shorts were way too big on me. They look a bit lose on the model, which is what I was expecting because she is very thin and built like I am. If you don't have thighs to fill this out, you may run into the same issue. I would have kept them otherwise and hated to return them. At almost 30 bucks though, I couldn't justify keeping them considering the issue. I'm very straight and athletically built. Hope this helps!
Best jean shorts I’ve ever owned!
Love them. Wear them all the time.

评论概述: Silk-like fabric feel/Only the front is "Cut Off" - the back is hemmed.
评论详情: I really liked the feel of the denim.  It was silk like, but the design was strange to me.  Only the front of the shorts was "Cut Off"...the back was hemmed.  Not sure if this was a fluke, but I didn't like it.  I am 5'2", 160 lbs and ordered a size 30 which was still a little tight around my waist.
